questions.question: $$ \text{Initial guess} \quad x1 = 1 $$ $$ x2 = x1 - \frac{f(x1)}{df(x1)} $$ $$\text{equation } = x^2-cos(x) $$ $$ df(x) = 2x + sin(x) $$ $$\text{What is function value of 3rd iteration using Newton Raphson method?}$$

$$ \text{Initial guess} \quad x1 = 1 $$ $$ x2 = x1 - \frac{f(x1)}{df(x1)} $$ $$\text{equation } = x^2-cos(x) $$ $$ df(x) = 2x + sin(x) $$ $$\text{What is root value of 3rd iteration using Newton Raphson method?}$$
